author: NetBrain
description:
Device Type:
Cisco IOS XR
Command:
       show interface

samples.name: Sample1
samples.parserRules: {"parseRule":[{"type":"4","name":"interfaces","keyVariables":null,"startLine":"regex:^\\S+\\s+is","endLine":null,"isLineAsParagraph":"0","lineAsParagraph":"1","excludeEndLine":"1","isUsePrevars":"0","usePrevars":null,"child":{"parseRule":[{"type":"0","keyWords":{"keyWord":["regex[$interface,$physical_state,$protocol_state]:(\\S+) is (.+), line protocol is (.+)","regex[$ip_address]:Internet address\\s+is (\\S+)","MTU $int:mtu bytes, BW $int:bw_kbit Kbit","Last clearing of \"show interface\" counters $last_clearing","input rate $int:input_rate bits","output rate $int:output_rate bits",", $int:input_drops total input drops","$int:input_errors input errors, $int:crc CRC,",", $int:output_drops total output drops","$int:output_errors output errors,"]},"statements":null,"variableTypes":{"variableType":["$interface:string","$physical_state:string","$protocol_state:string","$ip_address:string","$mtu:int","$bw_kbit:int","$last_clearing:string","$input_rate:int","$output_rate:int","$input_drops:int","$input_errors:int","$crc:int","$output_drops:int","$output_errors:int"]},"xxid":"084a2910-0f4a-62f1-a600-4cfbb1aede7a"}]},"xxid":"a01607a6-2a77-7dac-73a7-fa6c6dce1132","interfaceKey":"$interface","hashColumns":["$interface","$physical_state","$protocol_state","$ip_address","$mtu","$input_drops","$input_errors","$crc","$output_drops","$output_errors"],"hashSort":false}]}
